summary: A Soulsborne sound replacer for Skyrim, providing a more intense combat experience. Co-authored by ryonAlice and me.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://gotgame.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/bloodborne.png[/img]
[size=3]This mod contains more than 200 audio files, which will help build up a Soulsborne-like atmosphere here in Skyrim.
Assets are mainly from Dark Souls series and Bloodborne. 
[/size]
[size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/26367874]ryonAlice[/url] collected all the audio files from Reddit. If you have any issues with the assets used in this mod, to relieve your doubt or clear things up, you'll have to contact with [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/26367874]ryonAlice[/url] for more details.
The preview video was uploaded by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/26367874]ryonAlice[/url]. Check its description for a comprehensive list of the mods used in the video.[/size]



You can find SSE version [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/19526/]here[/url].



[size=3]This mod was built with LE in mind and requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn. [/size]
[size=3]It comes in two main versions, [i]Japanese(日本語)[/i] translations are available for both.[/size]



[size=4][i]Regular version[/i][/size][size=3]:[/size]
[size=3]Mostly just a simple replacement for some vanilla sounds, with a few additional sounds. Compatible with other audio mods if loaded after.[/size]



[i][size=4]ISC version[/size][/i][size=3]:[/size]
[size=3]To use this version, [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54387]Immersive Sounds - Compendium[/url]﻿ is required. It is fully compatible with ISC and all ISC's patches.
If asked to overwrite when installed, just overwrite ISC files and you're good to go.[/size]

[size=3]

Both versions contain patches for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url]﻿ and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093]Weapons and Armors Fixes Remade[/url]﻿. Delete/uncheck them if no use.






This mod expands vanilla sounds in many ways.[/size]


[size=3][img]https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/elderscrolls/images/4/41/SkyrimDaggers.png[/img][/size]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#9900ff][size=4]I.[/size][/color][/font][size=3] With this mod installed, you'll get a brand new set of sounds while swinging your daggers or hitting your enemies with them. Considering daggers use one-handed swords' swing and impact sounds in vanilla Skyrim, no doubt that's an improvement.[/size]





﻿[img]https://i.imgur.com/0G5kD0C.png[/img]
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#9900ff][size=4]II.[/size][/color][/font][/b][size=3] Vanilla weapon swing and impacts are replaced by those used in Bloodborne. Bows, Crossbows, and Staffs are untouched.[/size]
[size=3]Separated by weapon types: War Axe, Sword, Mace, Dagger, Battleaxe, Greatsword, War hammer, Unarmed. [/size]
[size=3]Particularly different swing sounds for Warhammer and Battleaxe; unique sounds when hitting drugs with war axes/battleaxes/war hammers or fists.[/size]
[size=3]Bound weapons get new swing sounds as well. Different sounds for different weapons, that's convenient, isn't it?[/size]





[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#9900ff][size=4]III.[/size][/color][/font][size=3] An additional critical sound for sneak attacks and critical hits. [/size]
[size=3]New sound when reanimating a corpse, pick up a [/size]nirnroot[size=3].  [/size]
[size=3]New music when absorbing a dragon's soul, get a reward or killed, etc.[/size]
[size=3]And many more wait for you to discover.[/size]




[size=3]All relative edits made by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch(aka USLEEP)[/url] have been integrated into this mod's plugin, also, you don't need USLEEP as a requirement. They're fully compatible with each other. Just load my plugin after USLEEP. [/size]




[size=3]Remember to post your [u][i][b]Feedback[/b][/i][/u] in the comment section. Any bug reports are welcome.

[/size]



[color=#ff0000][size=4][u][b]Warning[/b][/u][/size][/color][size=3]:[/size]
[u][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/26367874]ryonAlice[/url]﻿ and I do not own or have no right on all audios used in this mod. You're not allowed to upload this file on other websites.[/size][/u]




[color=#ffff00][size=4][u][b]Credits[/b][/u][/size][/color][size=3]:

FromSoftware for most sounds used by this mod.


[url=https://www.reddit.com/user/Sentuh]Sentuh[/url] for [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/darksouls/comments/4930vd/request_a_sound_ii/?st=jl974y0f&sh=109ed0a7]Dark Souls sounds[/url].


[url=https://www.reddit.com/user/JackSparrow420]JackSparrow420[/url] for [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/bloodborne/comments/7lxro4/the_sound_effects_of_bloodborne_800_files/?st=jl974yeb&sh=2999f1d7]Bloodborne sounds[/url].


[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3222912]lazyskeever[/url]'s Immersive Sounds - Compendium﻿ for the inspiration.[/size]
author: ryonAlice and aeloyis
